sub_title: Technical Project Manager / CRM, OM & Integrations
summary:
●	Technical Project Manager with 18 years of experience, delivering wide range of ICT solutions and managing organizational change.
●	Broad experience in Telecom domain, managing Order management and Integration systems. 
●	Understanding business requirements and translate them into technical solution.
●	Strong technical skill set and hands-on exposure in API management, Microservices, Middleware and BPM technologies.
●	Collaborate effectively with diverse teams including engineering, infra, business stakeholders and external vendors.
●	Proven mentor and training with expertise in communicating across organizational levels and with cross-functional teams to drive shared vision and foster culture of excellence.

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Information Systems

certifications.name: Sun certified programmer for the Java Platform, Standard Edition 5.0

profile_positions.description:
•	Gather requirements, establish project scopes of work; communicate project deliverable timeframes and benchmarks.
•	Maintained ROI and other business use-case requirements, as dictated by clients, stakeholders, and management. 
•	Incident management, RCA (root cause analysis), resolving incidents within the defined SLA.
•	Communicate continuously with multiple scrum teams for establishing realistic and attainable expectations for the e2e system release. 
•	Managed multiple systems to ensure deliveries completed in compliance with regulatory rules and internal guidelines.
•	Ensured proper processes in place to maintain high quality in deliverables.
profile_positions.title: Manager - Projects

profile_positions.description:
o	As a subject matter expert, responsible for designing, building, testing and supporting APIs.
o	In charge of providing coding and analysis relative to assignments, and performing unit testing on applicable code.
o	Expert at resolving application defects and at testing, debugging, and refining software to produce the required product.
o	Establish project scopes of work; communicate project deliverable timeframes and benchmarks to business stakeholders. 
o	Partnered face to face with stakeholders to close on solution requirements.
profile_positions.title: Integration Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project Description 

TeliaSonera is a Telecom Service Provider in Finland. It has a BPM platform which interfaces with several systems included in Telia System architecture. 
Contribution

In role as Automation Developer, performed below activities.
Explored a wide variety of open source technologies and tools.
Analyzed the current situation of the system architecture.
Designed the DevOps Automation architecture and implementation plan.
Prioritized Deployment Automation as first step and implemented it.
profile_positions.title: Automation Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project Description 

Tele2 is a Telecom Service Provider in various countries (Sweden, Netherlands, Latvia, …). It has a Central Middleware platform which interfaces with the systems included in Tele2 System architecture in various countries. 
Contribution

	In role as Integration and API Developer, performed below activities.
o	As a subject matter expert when in Integration and API Developer role, responsible for designing, building, testing and supporting APIs.
o	Expert at resolving application defects, and at testing, debugging, and refining software to produce the required product.

	In additional role as Scrum Master, performed below activities.
o	As a servant leader in the Scrum Master role, consultant managed the Scrum Process and ensured the team adhered to good Agile development principles. 
o	Well versed in the Agile Manifesto, helped the Scrum Team by removing impediments and external distractions. 
o	Facilitates meetings sprint planning, retrospective, review, daily stand-up. 

	In additional role as Product Owner, performed below activities.
o	Acted as the client's visionary when in the Product Owner role. Responsible for the right product being delivered on or before time and under budget. 
o	Create, maintain, prioritize, and groom the Product Backlog. Write User Stories. Define Release and Sprint Goals. 

	Highlights of major projects during this period.
o	4G Consumer Mobile roll-out in Tele2 NL landscape.
o	System Upgrades for Middleware, CRM, Billing and Provisioning.
o	4G Consumer Mobile roll-out in Tele2 Baltics (Latvia, Lithuania and Estonia).
o	4G Consumer Mobile roll-out in Tele2 Sweden.

	Highlights of major deliveries during this period.
o	Secure Payment iDeal interface towards Payment Gateway.
o	Port In/Port Out interface towards Porting provider.
o	ILT/BKR CreditCheck interface towards CreditCheck provider.
o	Logistics interface towards Logistics provider.
o	GetBalances interface towards Billing systems.
profile_positions.title: Integration and API Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project Description 

Tele2 NL is a Telecom Service Provider in Netherlands. It has a NL Middleware platform which interfaces with the Dutch systems included in Tele2 NL System architecture. 

Contribution

	Creating the technical design of Middleware Integrations basing on the requirements.
	Developing the interfaces using flow service, creating utility services. 
	Manage the TechM managed project including tracking and monitoring of deliverables and communication of project updates including issues, risks and mitigation plans to Client and TechM leadership. 
	Manage a team of 10+ developers and testers and responsible for their day to day activities, performance evaluation and career progression. Also, cultivate a culture where everyone can be innovative and can share their thoughts with the team.
	Responsible for client relationship by leading monthly PRM meetings, frequent touch points with client peers, coordinating client visits, leading all hands meet with client leadership and account mining initiatives. 
	Manage resource souring requests, resource mobility in the team and project financials. Also, tracking and monitoring project metrics to identify avenues for potential value add to the client.
profile_positions.title: Senior Integration Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project Description 

The Provisioning Solution in GE Energy-Shared Services is one of the major projects in GE Energy, integrates the application systems Oracle, JDBC, Siebel and Mainframe using Java Spring and Hibernate frameworks. Active works aids in using the existing databases with the newly developed applications, thus providing a reliable availability of the data. This allows the users in various locations of GE across US and rest of the world to access required information from various applications using different databases. 

Contribution:

➢	Worked as Team member and provided technical support for all GE Energy applications related to this project. 
➢	Check the status of work in progress, track and resolve customer/business issues. 
➢	Work on change requests, estimation of work, and analysis on requirement.
➢	Analyze on issues and working with team, providing RCA to business/client.
➢	Provide Testing Support and Redesign/Code Change suggestions.
➢	Handling planned and unplanned outages for applications, and communicate to respective application users, business.
➢	Involved in conducting various forms of testing with the applications across various locations of GE and perform any required bug fixing.
➢	Work in tight schedules to meet aggressive deadlines of the Project.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
UTStarcom Web Provisioning Server

Project Description 

The Web provisioning server enables browser-based access to soft-switch session agents and back-end servers. It’s a Web Server application that provides the main administrative interface to the Call Server.
Contribution

	Analysis of the specifications provided by the clients
	Design and Development
	Coding using JSP and Java Servlets
	Database management and JDBC connectivity
	Developed Reporting Feature on Provisioning Server
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
